α Global Portal (β version):  http://www.sony.net/Products/ilc/


Unleash your full creative control

The extraordinary new α77 empowers you to capture images that fully express your creative vision. Through revolutionary Translucent Mirror Technology, it surmounts traditional limitations to provide accelerated autofocusing and live-viewing on a full-time basis.
